constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 找到一个最短的子序列，该子序列在输入字符串中仅出现一次
constraints.formal: ∃ subseq ∈ S, |subseq| is minimal and count(subseq, S) = 1

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 如果有多个长度相同的最短唯一子序列，输出第一个出现的子序列
constraints.formal: if multiple subseqs with |subseq| = min, output the one with the smallest starting index

result.description: 求满足条件的最短子串长度

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间可加性：通过前缀和计算任意子区间的哈希值，从而判断子串的唯一性

invariants.name: monotonicity
invariants.description: 单调性：滑动窗口的右端点单调递增，左端点根据当前窗口内的子串唯一性进行调整
